document_data.mainbody:
Irbryth Authamaun was a human sage inhabiting Waterdeep in the late 14 century DR. He knew just about everything there was to know about Waterdeep.
Irbryth specialized in the lore of Waterdeep, with a special emphasis on the citys broadsheets and history.
He lived in a house in Waterdeeps North Ward, This house served as his home and office.
